title: 【tea*1】据说近几天要下雪
author: skyjjjjjjzzh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyjjjjjjzzh 于 2016-11-20 20:38 编辑 

别开玩笑，是真的吗

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content: 是吗，我们加拿大下了一整天了。

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
貌似天天都下




--------“即使世界背叛你，我也会在你身边。”

replies.author: 晓夜Port
replies.txt_content: 对啊 我们这边已经下过了 雪花满天飞 冻死个人

replies.author: Neversay
replies.txt_content: 下雪没有下雨倒是经常

replies.author: ROF
replies.txt_content: 福建这里没下，只是下雨。。。
